title: Pattern Matching Switch
description:
We've written some code to read input and convert it into an `Object` named `obj`. This object could be an `Integer`, a `String`, or `null`.

Write a **Switch Expression with Pattern Matching** to check the type of `obj`:

- If `String` -> Print `String: ` followed by the value.
- If `Integer` -> Print `Integer: ` followed by the value.
- If `null` -> Print `It is null`.
- Otherwise -> Print `Unknown type`.
